message:
Don't be sad ...

The prophet lost his child..

Don't be sad

The prophet lost his parents

Don't be sad

The prophet was criticized 

Don't be sad

The prophet was called names 

Don't be sad

Look at the response of the prophets when they were faced with trials...

“Hasbunallahu wa ni`mal Wakil’: 

حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ

Allah (Alone) is Sufficient for us, and He is the Best Disposer of affairs (for us).”

آل عمران : Surah Al ‘Imran (3:173)
